{U}{B} SMUGGLE Move counters around for fun and profit.
{B}{R} BATTLES Run a good race—Just not necessarily a fair one.
{R}{G} JURY RIG Your expendable artifact creatures can come back again as vehicles.
{G}{W} VEHICLES Artifact creatures and regular Vehicles are both bonzer here.
{W}{B} WITHER Win a war of attrition by grinding down the enemy's creatures.
{B}{G} -1/-1 COUNTERS You're bigger than them. Especially if you cut their knees out.
{G}{U} MUTANTS Those oddboys aren't so bad when they travel in packs.
{U}{R} VEHICLES Hit hard and hit fast and hit them with a big greasy ute.
{R}{W} RACES Hit battles quickly, or drive Vehicles, your summoning sick creatures will always have something to do.

Flash

cards.flavor_text: [i]Smokedrinker riders care only for sensation. The loudest engines, the greasiest exhausts, the burning tang of hot metal—these are all that make life worth living.[/i]
